DataElement.preferredName: Methotrexate Agent Prescribed To Take Saturday Data Unknown Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A single character text field to record if Methotrexate was prescribed to take on Saturday.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Methotrexate Agent Prescribed To Take Saturday
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An antimetabolite and antifolate agent with antineoplastic and immunosuppressant activities. Methotrexate binds to and inhibits the enzyme dihydrofolate reductase, resulting in inhibition of purine nucleotide and thymidylate synthesis and, subsequently, inhibition of DNA and RNA syntheses. Methotrexate also exhibits potent immunosuppressant activity although the mechanism(s) of actions is unclear._An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect._A doctor's order for medicine or another intervention._Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement._As pertains to a medication: ingest, inhale, instill, or inject._The seventh and last day of the week.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An antimetabolite with antineoplastic and immunomodulating properties.  Methotrxate inhibits the enzyme dihydrofolate reductase, resulting in inhibition of purine nucleotide and thymidylate synthesis and, subsequently, inhibition of DNA and RNA syntheses.  Methotrexate also exhibits potent immunosuppressant properties. (NCI04):An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: An antimetabolite and antifolate agent with antineoplastic and immunosuppressant activities. Methotrexate binds to and inhibits the enzyme dihydrofolate reductase, resulting in inhibition of purine nucleotide and thymidylate synthesis and, subsequently, inhibition of DNA and RNA syntheses. Methotrexate also exhibits potent immunosuppressant activity although the mechanism(s) of actions is unclear.
An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect.

Property.preferredDefinition: A doctor's order for medicine or another intervention.:Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.:As pertains to a medication: ingest, inhale, instill, or inject.:The seventh and last day of the week.

Concepts.definition: A verbal or written order given by an authorized person instructing a patient to obtain and use a medical device, prescription or undergo a procedure.
Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.
As pertains to a medication: ingest, inhale, instill, or inject.
The seventh and last day of the week.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: a single character text field to record data.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
